articles.title: Google will retire Chrome's HTTPS padlock icon because no one knows what it means - Ars Technica

articles.title: 524-foot Asteroid, larger than London Eye, to come scarily close after King Charles coronation - HT Tech
articles.description: A monstrously large asteroid, which is as large as 524-foot, much bigger than the London Eye, is set to get very close to Earth just after the coronation of King Charles.

articles.title: Double Danger for Young Women: High Risk of Rehospitalization After Heart Attack - SciTechDaily
articles.description: NIH-supported findings identify risk factors in women and suggest the need for closer monitoring. A study funded by the National Institutes of Health shows that women aged 55 and younger are nearly twice as likely to be rehospitalized within a year of a heart…

articles.title: ESA Can't Deploy JUICE's Radar Antenna. It Needs It to Scan Under the Ice at Callisto, Europa, and Ganymede - Universe Today
articles.description: ESA technicians are still working to free the stuck RIME antenna on the JUICE spacecraft. So far, they've only moved it a little.
